com.thedomination.view

Class DominationPhaseView

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thedomination.view.DominationPhaseView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DominationPhaseObserver

    public class DominationPhaseView
extends java.lang.Object
implements DominationPhaseObserver

    Domination Phase View

    The Class DominationPhaseView. The phase view displays: (1) the name of the game phase currently being played (2) the current player’s name (3) information about actions that are taking place during this phase.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Aditi Bhayana
